subject: Getting JUnit 4 from CVS
msgSnippet: Howdy Folks, I m trying to get JUnit 4 from SF using : pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/junit as described on
messageBody:
Howdy Folks,

I'm trying to get JUnit 4 from SF using :
pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/junit as described
on http://sourceforge.net/cvs/?group_id=15278 without luck. I've tried a
command line CVS client, the Eclipse
3.1 client and TortoiseCVS. I get varying errors depending on the client,
but they seem to all be related to
either the CVS server timing out or the connection being refused.

Sorry for the noise on what should be a very simple question, but can anyone
point out what I'm doing wrong?
Is it possible the JUnit 4 branch was moved to another repository?
--
----
Thanks,
quikdraw2700@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
